job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: A 6 month REMOTE Software Engineer job in Texas is currently available through Modis Engineering, formally Adecco group. This for an excellent, global renowned client. The pay rate is $62/HR. Daily ResponsibilitiesOn a daily basis , creating SailPoint Identity IQ components to support IAM Migration. In addition, unit testing, fixing bugs, and UAT testingKey Skills - Sailpoint, Java.Description:Deploy Identity Governance solution to meet customer requirements using SailpointFollow approved life cycle methodologies, create documentation for design and testingProficient in Java ProgrammingInteract/coordinate with customers as requiredResolve technical issues through debugging, research, and investigation.Maintenance of security applications and serviceSupporting the application and the customers (here the customers are other domain teams – not the end user)Adhering to all standard SDLC and SPLC processes in developing the solutions and servicesEffective communication with partner teams & customerAssume best intentionsRequired:4-8 years of industry experience in design, development, customization, configuration, deployment of any Identity Management and Governance productsMinimum of 3 years’ experience in SailpointHands on experience with Java based technologies, Microservices, Containerization, CI/CD (Continuous Integration/Continuous Delivery)Thorough domain knowledge on the below areas of IAGUser Lifecycle Management, Provisioning and ReconciliationAuditing, Reporting and user activity MonitoringAccess CertificationJava/J2EE and strong SQL knowledgeKnowledge of Web Services (REST/SOAP)Java/J2EESailpointSQL / REST.Top 3 skills: Sailpoint Identity IQGit Hub Merging / Rebasing, JavaExperience in developing and testingIf you are interested in this job, then please click APPLY NOW. For other opportunities available at Modis Engineering www.modis.com. If you have questions about the position, please contact Pragya Jain at 408-962-4980 or pragya.jain@modis.com.  Equal Opportunity Employer Minorities/Women/Veterans/Disabled
